title: Refactor Web dashboard epic components
description: Refactor epic-related code in React web dashboard. Improve epic components architecture, state management, and API integration. Extract epic hooks and utilities, enhance epic visualization and interaction patterns.

comments.text: WEB REFACTORING AREAS: 1) Extract epic React components into dedicated modules, 2) Implement epic-specific hooks for state management, 3) Refactor epic API integration and data fetching, 4) Improve epic visualization components (tree view, progress), 5) Enhance epic routing and navigation, 6) Add epic-specific utilities and helpers
Plan to expose epic data via new service
